header.p: This page gives more examples on how to use the applet.

section.title: Examples of Animations
section.p:
A carbon-cation rearrangement reaction
<APPLET CODE="JmolApplet" ARCHIVE="JmolApplet.jar" WIDTH="200" HEIGHT="200"> <PARAM NAME="load" VALUE="SN1_reaction.cml"/> </APPLET>

Rotamers of ethane
<APPLET CODE="JmolApplet" ARCHIVE="JmolApplet.jar" WIDTH="200" HEIGHT="200"> <PARAM NAME="load" VALUE="conformeren.cml"/> </APPLET>

section.title: Examples with other file formats
section.p:
Caffeine in MDL mol file format
<APPLET CODE="JmolApplet" ARCHIVE="JmolApplet.jar" WIDTH="200" HEIGHT="200"> <PARAM NAME="load" VALUE="caffeine.mol"/> </APPLET>
